name: Puppies Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Huge Update! More than 30 new themes, 900+ amazing pictures in HD-resolution!!! Weekly bonus theme!!!
Are you a true admirer of jigsaw puzzles but tired of constantly missing pieces? We have a way out! Cute puppy jigsaw puzzles hd is the best choice for you!

What makes dog jigsaw puzzles special?
- Rich collection of high definition images of cute doggies will challenge your brain and help you enjoy jigsaw puzzles free cute animals;
- 5 difficulty modes suit for all ages starting from easy animal puzzles for kids free to difficult jigsaw puzzles for experts;
- Collect puppy puzzle games of different sizes: 2x3, 4x6, 6x9, 12х8, 15х10;
- Save your progress to continue playing from where you’ve stopped before;
- A number of jigsaw puzzles with levels are so addictive that you'll want to play more and more;
- Pleasant background music contributes to the relaxing atmosphere;
- Play free jigsaw puzzle puppies with no wifi needed;
- Intuitive interface and touch controls of dog jigsaw puzzles for kids are designed to be played even by toddlers and preschool children;
- This husky dog puzzle works perfectly well both on smartphones and tablets.

A wide selection of high quality dog and puppys jigsaw puzzles for free will bring many hours of fun to the whole family while playing free puzzle games.
The game is so easy to play. Parts which are placed correctly will stick together. Assemble pieces into groups, then move and connect the groups. With 5 difficulty levels both children and adults will enjoy these 100 piece jigsaw puzzles.
Animals Jigsaw Puzzles are also designed for the development of fine motor skills, logical thinking, concentration, attention visual and spatial thinking.

Want more jigsaw puzzles free games for adults? Check out more free themes!

Auto-renewing subscription: "Enjoy ALL THEMES w/o ads" for only $0,99/month.
Purchase will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of the trial period on confirmation.
Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes Account Settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription, where applicable.
